name: Bjørn Asle
description: Bjørn Asle er utdannet sivilingeniør fra NTH. Han har over 20 år med erfaring med programvareutvikling fra ulike bransjer. Bjørn Asle har jobbet mest med Java,  men er alltid interessert i å lære nye ting. Han har tidligere jobbet for Det Norske Veritas, Conax, Abel DRM Systems og CapGemini.Bjørn Asle er gift og har fire barn. Fritiden bruker han på å spille bass, og litt snekring når overskuddet er stort.
haiku:
Coding bassist soul
Java lines beneath his feet
Freedom in the fret
summary_en:
Here is a short paragraph in English about Bjørn Asle:

Bjørn Asle is a civil engineer graduate from NTH (Norwegian University of Science and Technology) with over 20 years of experience in software development for various industries. He has primarily worked with Java, but has always been interested in learning new things. Outside of work, Bjørn enjoys playing bass guitar and indulging in leisure activities when he has the time off.
